Global mode, triggered after the complet: Global mode, triggered after the completion of the following actions
Local mode, triggered after the completi: Local mode, triggered after the completion of actions bound to this workflow
The collection to which the triggered da: The collection to which the triggered data belongs.
Triggered after the completion of a requ: Triggered after the completion of a request initiated through an action button or API, such as after adding or updating data. Suitable for data processing, sending notifications, etc., after actions are completed.
